data.message: https://www.facebook.com/Western-Medical-Associates-1438529513074231/?ref=page_internal--Good Morning! I was wondering if someone could please help me be able to login on this facebook account? The person who was managing this facebook page for our company no longer is employed with us. No one knows what the login and password information is. We either want to delete this page so that we can create a new one or be able to have access to new login information. Thank you so much for your assistance.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Sonya. The only way that you'll be able to gain a role on the Page is if your former employee grants you an admin role. From there, you can remove their administrator access and continue to maintain or delete the Page. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2dMAqj9. -Joe
Is there any way to delete this facebook site totally so we can begin another one? I understand this could not be done by us but by a team at facebook?
We would like to delete this facebook site for our company due to we are unable to access it. Will you please do this for us? Thank you!
